name: @DO.examples
author: Ziad S. Saad
description: A script to illustrate the use of Displayable Objects in SUMA.

inputs.description: Run this script in test mode where user prompts are timed out at 2 seconds, and the command output log is preserved in a file called __testlog.txt
inputs.name: Auto Test Flag

output-files.description: Output log file when running in auto test mode
output-files.name: Output Log File
